BNB Chain ประกาศการสนับสนุน ERC-8004 เพื่อเปิดใช้งานข้อมูลประจำตัวที่ยืนยันได้สำหรับเอเจนต์ AI อัตโนมัติ

BNB Chain Announces Support for ERC-8004 to Enable Verifiable Identity for Autonomous AI Agents

1d ago//Chainwire
ethereumaltcoins
AI

Summary

TH

BNB Chain ประกาศสนับสนุน ERC-8004 ซึ่งเป็นมาตรฐานตัวตนบนเชนใหม่ที่ช่วยให้ Autonomous AI Agents สามารถมีตัวตนที่ตรวจสอบได้และพกพาได้ข้ามแพลตฟอร์มต่างๆ การพัฒนานี้มีเป้าหมายเพื่อส่งเสริม Agent Economy ที่เปิดกว้าง ซึ่งตัวแทนซอฟต์แวร์สามารถรักษาชื่อเสียงและความรับผิดชอบได้อย่างต่อเนื่องโดยไม่ถูกจำกัดอยู่เพียงแอปพลิเคชันเดียว เพื่อสนับสนุนสิ่งนี้ ชุมชน BNB Chain ยังได้แนะนำ BAPs (BNB Application Proposals) เพื่อสร้างมาตรฐานสำหรับ application layer โดยข้อเสนอแรกคือ BAP-578 ที่ก่อตั้งมาตรฐาน Non-Fungible Agent (NFA) ซึ่งทำให้ AI Agents มีอยู่ในรูปแบบสินทรัพย์บนเชนที่สามารถถือครองสินทรัพย์ ดำเนินการตามคำสั่ง และถูกซื้อขายหรือจ้างงานได้

EN

BNB Chain has announced support for ERC-8004, a new on-chain identity standard enabling autonomous AI agents to possess verifiable and portable identities across different platforms. This innovation aims to facilitate an open agent economy where software agents can maintain persistent reputations and accountability, operating independently without being confined to single applications. To support this, the BNB Chain community also introduced BAPs (BNB Application Proposals) to standardize the application layer. The first proposal, BAP-578, establishes the Non-Fungible Agent (NFA) standard, allowing AI agents to exist as on-chain assets that can hold assets, execute logic, and be bought, sold, or hired.

Key Points

  • BNB Chain adopts ERC-8004 to give autonomous AI agents portable, verifiable identities across platforms.
  • The initiative aims to create an open agent economy with persistent reputation and accountability for software agents.
  • BNB Chain introduced BAPs (BNB Application Proposals) and launched BAP-578, the Non-Fungible Agent (NFA) standard, allowing agents to be traded as on-chain assets.

Article

[PRESS RELEASE – Dubai, UAE, February 4th, 2026] BNB Chain today announced its support for ERC-8004 , a new on-chain identity standard designed to give autonomous AI agents verifiable, portable identity across platforms. The development represents an important step toward an open and scalable agent economy, where software can operate independently with persistent reputation, accountability, and user control. Autonomous agents are software programs capable of making decisions, coordinating with other services, and carrying out actions on behalf of users. As these agents become more capable, they will need to operate beyond single apps or centralized platforms. For that to be possible, agents require a reliable way to prove who they are. Under ERC-8004, an agent is no longer confined to one application or forced to restart its reputation every time it enters a new environment. Instead, it can maintain persistent identity as it moves across platforms, enabling other agents, services, and users to verify its legitimacy and track its history over time. To complement ERC-8004, the BNB Chain community introduces BAPs (BNB Application Proposals), a new standard for the application layer. Unlike BEPs, which govern core protocol changes, BAPs define how apps work and communicate – covering interfaces, wallet and identity conventions, token and NFT standards, and app-to-app interoperability. The first BAP, BAP-578, launches the Non-Fungible Agent (NFA) standard, enabling AI agents to exist as onchain assets that can hold assets, execute logic, interact with protocols, and be bought, sold, or hired. This marks the first step toward an open, predictable, and interoperable Agent Economy on BNB Chain. Users can explore how to start building with ERC-8004 and BAP-578 on BNB Chain in the developer documentation HERE. About BNB Chain BNB Chain is a community-driven blockchain ecosystem that is removing barriers to Web3 adoption. It is composed of: BNB Smart Chain (BSC) : A secure DeFi hub with the lowest gas fees of any EVM-compatible L1; serves as the ecosystem’s governance chain. opBNB : A scalability L2 that delivers some of the lowest gas fees of any L2 and rapid processing speeds. BNB Greenfield : Meets decentralized storage needs for the ecosystem and lets users establish their own data marketplaces.
